quotes.text: You have the power to heal your life, and you need to know that.
They don't know that we know they know we know.
Don't it make you sad to know that life is more than who you are?
Leave something for someone but don't leave someone for something.
The people with ideas have no power and the people with power have no ideas.
You must take life the way it comes at you and make the best of it.
If you don't know what you want, how are you going to know when you get it?
quotes.source: Unlimited Memory: How to Use Advanced Learning Strategies to Learn Faster, Remember More and Be More Productive

quotes.text: If you have to ask, you will never know. If you know, you need only ask.
quotes.source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quotes.text: Your memory is the glue that binds your life together.
quotes.source: Unlimited Memory: How to Use Advanced Learning Strategies to Learn Faster, Remember More and Be More Productive

quotes.text: I'm sure there are things you know that you don't even know you know.
You can't use the fire exit because you're not made of fire.
The person that has the most to do with what happens to you is you!
quotes.source: Unlimited Memory: How to Use Advanced Learning Strategies to Learn Faster, Remember More and Be More Productive

quotes.text: There are darknesses in life and there are lights, and you are one of the lights, the light of all lights.
Sometimes the world as you know it just decides to become something else.
If you only do what you can do, you will never be more than who you are now.
If I have to hear one more time that you did this for the family...
And in the end, the love you take is equal to the love you make.
I've always loved you, and when you love someone, you love the whole person, just as he or she is, and not as you would like them to be.
Memory is a way of holding onto the things you love, the things you are, the things you never want to lose.
quotes.source: Unlimited Memory: How to Use Advanced Learning Strategies to Learn Faster, Remember More and be More Productive

quotes.text: You should never, never doubt something that no one is sure of.
Make sure you marry someone who laughs at the same things you do.
If you think that you are going to love something, give it a try.
quotes.source: What it Takes to Make More Money than Your Parents

quotes.text: I have waited lifetimes to find you. Now that you're here I can remind you of the things I've been dreaming of times two.
Are you trying to impress me? What would impress me more is if you never did that again.
Yeah it's you, you're the one that makes me feel right. I've been in love with her for ages and I can't seem to get it right. I fell in love with her in stages my whole life.
Believe in one thing too much and you have no room for new ideas.
Cleaning your house while kids are around is like shoveling the walk while it's still snowing.
quotes.source: Funny Quotes: Slightly Twisted Words of Wisdom & Other Funny Sayings

quotes.text: The day the power of love overrules the love of power, the world will know peace.
quotes.source: Doing Research in Emergency and Acute Care: Making Order Out of Chaos

quotes.text: I am the wisest man alive, for I know one thing, and that is that I know nothing.
You can't convince me what I want and what I need are separate things.
It's easy not to abuse your power when you don't actually have any power.
quotes.source: Inside The Mind of an Introvert

quotes.text: I often think that men don't understand what is noble and what is ignorant, though they always talk about it.
Now is the time for resting. Some things are ill to hear when the world's in shadow.
Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear - not absence of fear.
There's no reason a fake can't do what the real thing would. And it's possible for a fake to be more real than the real thing.
It matters not how a man dies, but how he lives. The act of dying is not of importance, it lasts so short a time.
There is something about yourself that you don't know.
I am he as you are he as you are me and we are all together.
Anything is edible if you deep fry it long enough.
There will come a time when all of us are dead.
We know little of who we were, only something of who we are, and nothing of who we may be.
You know when I was a kid I always wanted to be a cowboy, and now knowing I'm going to spend my future in the past sounds like a wonderful way to spend my retirement years.
quotes.source: Back to the Future Part III

quotes.text: When we remember, we only get a version of the last time we remember it.
When you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.
Where do you think you're going? Because I don't think you're going where you think you're going.
When everyone else was thinking it was time for bed, his mind was telling him it's time to get ahead of the competition.
quotes.source: The Mamba Mentality: How I Play

quotes.text: You must learn from the mistakes of others because you can't possibly live long enough to make them all yourself.
quotes.source: Funny Quotes: Slightly Twisted Words of Wisdom & Other Funny Sayings

quotes.text: I would rather spend one lifetime with you, than face all the ages of this world alone.
